mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (user_name, nickname, user_password, email, tel_1, tel_2, location, user_role, user_status, money) VALUES (#{userName}, #{nickname}, #{userPassword}, #{email}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{location}, #{userRole}, #{userStatus}, #{money})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET user_name = #{userName}, nickname = #{nickname}, user_password = #{userPassword}, email = #{email}, tel_1 = #{tel1}, tel_2 = #{tel2}, location = #{location}, user_role = #{userRole}, user_status = #{userStatus}, money = #{money} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
